oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Maggie Rose and Lucie Silvas - 2018-03-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances by singer songwriters Maggie Rose and Lucie Silvas from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame on March 3, 2018. Accompanied by Jon Green and Tom Maxwell. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Maggie Rose; Lucie Silvas;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (05:14) Opening comments and introduction of performer by Abi Tapia / (09:02) Opening comment from Maggie and Lucie / (09:45) Maggie introduces her first song / (11:21) Performs Hey Blondie (Maggie Rose) / (14:02) Lucie talks about Maggie and tells story about performing with Gabe Dixon / (14:48) Lucie introduces Jon Green on guitar and introduces the next song / (15:52) Performs Black Jeans (Lucie Silva and Jon Green) / (20:14) Maggie talks about Lucie / (21:21) Maggie introduces the next song / (22:06) Performs Change The Whole Thing (Maggie with Tom Maxwell) / (26:39) Maggie and Lucie talk about Tom Maxwell / (28:17) Lucie and Maggie answer question about the craft of songwriting and having your own voice / (31:13) Lucie introduces the next song / Performs Letters To Ghosts (Lucie and Jon) / (34:50) Maggie introduces the next song / (38:55) Performs Just Getting By (Maggie and Tom) / (40:18) Lucie talks about co-writing /

(41:20) Lucie introduces the next song / (42:05) Performs Everything Looks Beautiful (Lucie with Jon, Tom and Maggie) / (47:22) Maggie introduces the next song / (48:47) Performs Pull You Through (Maggie and Tom) / (52:28) Lucie talks about Maggie's song and their Grand Ole Opry appearance / (54:02) Lucie introduces the next song / (54:28) Performs Change My Mind (Lucie and Jon) / (57:53) Final comments from Maggie and Lucie / (58:41) Walk-out music / (01:00:25) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rose, Maggie; Silvas, Lucie; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
